title: In turnabout, SunTrust removes contentious severance clause
text:
In turnabout, SunTrust removes contentious severance clause 
Published By: Computerworld.com - Today 
A controversial severance clause by SunTrust Banks requiring laid-off employees to be available to help without pay, has been removed, the b...
